entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
